alert.note: Alert for Augusta; Eastern Highland; Rockingham; Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 3:15AM EST until February 13 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of one to three inches, with localized amounts up to four inches along the higher ridges. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Virginia, Highland, Augusta, and Rockingham Counties. In West Virginia, Pendleton County. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Augusta; Eastern Highland; Rockingham; Western Highland
